title: Gamers Against War
content:

[[module CSS]]
:root {
    --header-title: "";
    --header-subtitle: "";
    --logo-image: url("	http://scpdsandbox.wikidot.com/local--files/collab:gamers-against-war/GAW%20logo");
    --header-height-on-desktop: 12rem;
    --bright-accent: 5, 144, 51;
    --medium-accent: 5, 144, 51;
    --dark-accent: 5, 144, 51;
}
.email {border: solid 2px #000000; width: 88%; padding: 1px 15px; margin: 10px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.5)}
.email-example a.collapsible-block-link {font-weight: bold;}
.tofrom {margin-left: 10px; margin-top: 5px; padding: 1px 15px; border-left: solid 3px maroon}
[[/module]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
+ Bluntfiend's Humble Doobie Barn
----
##green|**bluntfiend:**## Lmao someone just sent me this out of nowhere
##purple|**lesbian_gengar**## sent you what?
##green|**bluntfiend:**## Give me a moment, I'm trying to send it
##red|**gaycopmp4:**## lmao
##green|**bluntfiend:**## https://gamersagainstweed.bluntfiend.net/uploads/2jfjd883j3djksksdfl.jpg [[=image http://scpdsandbox.wikidot.com/local--files/collab:gamers-against-war/memetic%20hazard%20GFW%201]]
##purple|**lesbian gengar:**## a
##purple|**lesbian gengar:**## a
##purple|**lesbian gengar:**## a
##blue|**polaricecraps:**## ?
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## a
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## aa
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## a
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## a
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## a
##darkblue|**hetcopogg:**## wtf
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## aaa
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## a
##maroon|**harmpit:**## waht's goign onn?
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## a
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## a
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## a
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## a
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## a
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## a
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## aa
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## a
##green|**bluntfiend:**## What the fuck are you doing
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## a
##black|**bones:**## I assume there is a good reason for this spam ##purple|**lesbian_gengar**##.
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## sorry about that everyone
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## had to get that image off the screen
##red|**gaycopmp4:**## lmao why
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## ##green|**bluntfiend**## wtf why would you send a memetic
##orange|**jockjamsvol6:**## I was gone for like, 5 minutes.
##maroon|**harmpit:**## ohhh shtiitttt
##grey|**Server:**## 1 user has left
##green|**bluntfiend:**## What? It's just a stupid meme I found on twitter. You're not seriously saying that's a memetic.
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## it is literally a memetic
##deeppink|**kkrule:**## woah okay what
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## have you noticed any changes in your behavior lately?
##green|**bluntfiend:**## No, I feel completely normal.
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## are you sure?
##black|**bones:**## Judging by the content of the image in question, I would assume it has something to do with your prolific marijuana consumption.
##blue|**polaricecraps:**## ^^^
##green|**bluntfiend:**## Oh shit, you're right.
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## fuck
##green|**bluntfiend:**## I haven't had a smoke in at least a couple hours. I haven't even wanted to. Shit, this is weird.
##red|**gaycopmp4:**## now you're just fiend
##orange|**jockjamsvol6:**## Our intrepid leader has been robbed of his namesake. I guess this means I take his place
##orange|**jockjamsvol6:**## I officially declare us Gamers Against Jock Jams
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## lmao no need
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## i can make something to counteract it just give me a few minutes
##green|**bluntfiend:**## Shit, okay, thanks.
##grey|**Server:**## 1 user has joined
##lime|**gamemasterkindaforalittlebitofweed:**## drugs are bad - gamers for weed
##grey|**Server:**## 1 user has left
##orange|**jockjamsvol6:**## LMAO
##blue|**polaricecraps:**## ??? wtf
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## pfft
##maroon|**harmpit:**## hahahhshhaha
##green|**bluntfiend:**## Lmao Gamers For Weed is still a thing? I thought that was just a stupid meme
##purple|**jockjamsvol6:**## No they kinda turned into their own thing.
##red|**gaycopmp4:**## trying to get me to stop smoking?
##red|**gaycopmp4:**## this cannot go unpunished
##green|**bluntfiend:**## Agreed. We won't let them rob our lifestyle from us.
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## i have a few ideas
##blue|**polaricecraps:**## wait so like what exactly is gfw
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## us but bad /j
##green|**bluntfield:**## A few months ago ##orange|**jockjamsvol6**## made a new IRC called "Gamers For Weed" for a meme. It was funny for a bit, but everyone got bored of it after a bit and left. Apparently, some people stayed.
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## yeah, they've kinda formed their own community, half stupid bullshit and half support group for queer/anomalous teens
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## its cool to see. i check in every once in a while
##red|**gaycopmp4:**## you mean they've been right under our noses this whole time??? those bastards!
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## its mostly younger kids in gfw, like 13-18
##orange|**jockjamsvol6:**## Yeah, it's really cool to see them grow and develop their own identity. But this insubordination will not stand. We must retaliate.
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## ill pm you
##deeppink|**kkrule:**## anyways
##deeppink|**kkrule:**## does anyone wanna watch my stream?
[[/div]]

------

[[div class="blockquote"]]
+ Smoke-Free Lounge
-----
##grey|**Server:**## 1 user has joined
##lime|**gamemasterkindaforalittlebitofweed:**## operation log onto gamers against weed irc chat and make them quit weed was a success
##red|**halpidkplz:**## Dude your names for things are too long
##lightseagreen|**professorwhitesphere:**## or, alternatively: they aren't long enough
##maroon|**reaganomicks:**## yk what else isnt long enough
##brown|**shiningsilver:**## Perfect. How'd they react?
##lime|**gamemasterkindaforalittlebitofweed:**## not sure, I logged off before they could say anything
##orange|**aaaaa:**## Fastest logout in the west ;D
##maroon|**reaganomicks:**## that's not the only thing they're fast at-
##black|**juice:**## ##maroon|**reaganomicks**## Knock it off with the sexual innuendo. This is your last warning.
##lightseagreen|**professorwhitesphere:**## lmao ##maroon|**reaganomicks**## got told off
##lime|**gamemasterkindaforalittlebitofweed:**## you think they're gonna retaliate?
##brown|**shiningsilver:**## Yeah probably
##green|**mansplaining_kanaya:**## How So?
##lime|**gamemasterkindaforalittlebitofweed:**## yeah what do you think theyre gonna do
##brown|**shiningsilver:**## IDK, troll our socials maybe? I know they have some hackers so be prepared for that.
##orange|**aaaaa:**## I don't want them to hurt my Instagram TvT
##orange|**aaaaa:**## I just got to 300 followers!!! :D
##blue|**hellcat:**## yeah what if they delete my meme page
##brown|**shiningsilver:**## Guys, chill. They aren't going to do anything serious. They're not assholes.
##red|**halpidkplz:**## Tbh the internet would probably be better without most of us anyways
##lightseagreen|**professorwhitesphere:**## i mean. yeah.
##lime|**gamemasterkindaforalittlebitofweed:**## without us what would the world do? we're the last thing standing between civilized society and recreational marijuana
##green|**mansplaining_kanaya:**## Wait To Clarify We Don't Actually Have A Rule Against Weed Right?
##blue|**hellcat:**## ^^^ was wondering that too
##lime|**gamemasterkindaforalittlebitofweed:**## i will literally come to your house and slap you silly with a salmon if you do weed
##red|**halpidkplz:**## No weed allowed!! If you so much as THINK of smoking weed it's a permaban! /j
##maroon|**reaganomicks:**## weed is cringe dont smoke
##deeppink|**firecacti:**## bold of you to assume I have a house ##lime|**gamemasterkindaforalittlebitofweed**##
##brown|**shiningsilver:**## Knock yourself out. I don't smoke but I'm not gonna, like, ban anyone if you do. Your body your choice.
##orange|**aaaaa:**## Weed smells bad :C
##green|**mansplaining_kanaya:**## Okay Good To Know, Thank You ##brown|**shiningsilver**##
##brown|**shiningsilver:**## No problem.
##lightseagreen|**professorwhitesphere:**## anyway has anyone seen the new portal game?
##blue|**hellcat**## wait there's a new portal game??? holy shit???
##grey|**Server:**## 1 user has joined
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## https://gamersforweed.shiningsilver.net/uploads/fi39jdjd9320fk.jpg [[=image http://scpdsandbox.wikidot.com/local--files/collab:gamers-against-war/memetic%20hazard%20GAW%201 width="250px"]]
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## this means war
##grey|**Server:**## 1 user has left
##lime|**gamemasterkindaforalittlebitofweed:**## yeah it's been out for a bit
##lime|**gamemasterkindaforalittlebitofweed:**## AAAAAAAAAAAAAH
##orange|**aaaaa:**## Yes? o/
##red|**halpidkplz:**## SHIT
##red|**halpidkplz:**## I THINK I WANNA DO WEED NOW
##blue|**hellcat:**## im guessing that's the memetic effect
##green|**mansplaining_kanaya:**## I Feel No Different
##red|**halpidkplz:**## YEAH NO SHIT KANAYA
##lightseagreen|**professorwhitesphere:**## lmaooooo we deserved it tbh
##red|**halpidkplz:**## FUCK MY PARENTS ARE GONNA KILL ME IF I SMOKE
##black|**juice:**## ##red|**halpidkplz**## Calm down. Just look at the memetic we made and it'll be fine.
##brown|**shiningsilver:**## I guess this is war.
##maroon|**reaganomicks:**## the gamers against war
##blue|**hellcat:**## i second that name
##orange|**aaaaa:**## I third!!! XD
##lightseagreen|**professorwhitesphere:**## i fifth
##brown|**shiningsilver:**## It's settled. The Gamers Against War has officially begun.
##lime|**gamemasterkindaforalittlebitofweed:**## ohhhhh shiiiiiiiit
##lightseagreen|**professorwhitesphere:**## fuck yeah
[[/div]]

[[div class="email-example"]]
[[=]]
------
[[<]]
[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** All Foundation Staff
**From:** Recordkeeping and Information Security Administration
**Subject:** Memetic Hazards
[[/div]]
------
Due to recent events regarding GoI-102 ("Gamers Against Weed") and GoI-153 ("Gamers For Weed") and their use of memetic agents against Foundation personnel, personnel are reminded to never open emails, text messages, or other forms of communication on secure Foundation devices from unknown sources without crawlers scanning the content first for memetic, cognito, or infohazards.

Thank you,
Recordkeeping and Information Security Administration
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Agent James Caere
**From:** Dr. Peter Lyr
**Subject:** How are you?
[[/div]]
------
Hey, James, are you alright? I heard you guys in Eta-10 have been taking the brunt of these memetic attacks.

Best Wishes,
Dr. Peter Lyr
[[/div]]
[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Dr. Peter Lyr
**From:** Agent James Caere
**Subject:** Re:How are you?
[[/div]]
------
Hello Peter! Been awhile since we've last spoken. Yes, I'm fine. We've been dealing with these attacks, but they're more of jokes than much of anything right now. Just a bunch of memetic images telling people smoke weed or not smoke weed, from GAW and GFW.

Kind regards,
Agent James Caere
[[/div]]
[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Agent James Caere
**From:** Dr. Peter Lyr
**Subject:** Re:Re:How are you?
[[/div]]
------
It has been awhile since we've spoken, unfortunately. It's good that you're alright, though. That's what I've heard for the most part, about this whole situation. I'm just hoping it doesn't affect the Foundation any further than it is right now, although I've heard we've got good resources on stopping the spread internally and externally. Here's to hoping they don't take this joke too far, like usual with GAW.

Best Wishes,
Dr. Peter Lyr
[[/div]]
[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Agent James Caere, Dr. Peter Lyr
**From:** jockjamsvol6
**Subject:** Re:Re:Re:How are you?
[[/div]]
------
This is no mere "joke" or "shenanigan". One may consider it a "hijink", but under no circumstances should it be called a "jape". Our way of life has been threatened. Weed is disappearing from the streets at an alarming rate. 

This is the war against drugs, and we are on the side of the drugs.

- Gamers Against Weed
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
+  Bluntfield's Humble War Room
----

##black|**bones:**## .mute ##lightseagreen|**kektagon**##

##red|**gaycopmp4:**## lmao dumbass
##green|**bluntfiend:**## Alright, that's it. I'm locking Gamers Against Weed to new members. We are in a state of war, and that means sacrifices need to be made.
##grey|**Server:**## 5 channels have been locked
##orange|**jockjamesvol6:**## ##lightseagreen|**kektagon**## I'll PM you the countermeme.
##green|**bluntfiend:**## BTW, ##purple|**lesbian_gengar**## are you ready with that next meme yet?
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## finishing touches, give me a few
##blue|**polaricecraps:**## whats this one going to do?
##maroon|**harmpit:**## rmemebr when gacoyp gto soooopsised att btlunfelid fro tath [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-2293 stuipd stpehn kgin jkoe]
##orange|**jockjamsvol6:**## HAHAHAHAHAHA
##red|**gaycopmp4:**## dude fuck you

##orange|**jockjamsvol6:**## ##red|**gaycopmp4**##, you're entitled to your opinion and all, but can we please not do this again? I thought we were past this.
##red|**gaycopmp4:**## fine. this doesn't mean i think its funny, i just care more about winning the gamers against war than i do about this stupid joke
##green|**bluntfiend:**## Duly noted.
##grey|**Server:**## 1 user has joined
##deeppink|**kkrule:**## hey ##green|**bluntfiend**## im trying to add my friend to the chat but it cant join, did the password change or something?

##green|**bluntfiend:**## I locked the chat to new- what she said.
##deeppink|**kkrule:**## :(
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## ##green|**bluntfiend**## new meme is ready. should i send it or does somebody else want to do the honors?
##deeppink|**kkrule:**## oh i want to!

+ Smoke-Free Battlefield
----
##green|**mansplaining_kanaya:**## Guys Help My Parents Found My Rainbow Flag
##red|**halpidkplz:**## Oh shit, how'd they react?
##deeppink|**firecacti:**## r u ok
##green|**mansplaining_kanaya:**## They Asked Why I Have It And I Said It Was A Gift For A Friend
##grey|**Server:**## 1 user has joined

##orange|**aaaaa:**## Oh no!!! D:
##maroon|**reaganomicks:**## shit you good
##green|**mansplaining_kanaya:**## Not Really
##darkblue|**risingstorm:**## anything we can do?
##green|**mansplaining_kanaya:**## No I Think I Am Just Going To Go Cry For A Bit
##green|**mansplaining_kanaya:**## I Don't Know When I'll Be Able To Log On Again So I'll See You When I Can
##lightseagreen|**professorwhitesphere:**## ok, feel better soon <3
##lime|**gamemasterkindaforalittlebitofweed:**## we're here for you
##red|**halpidkplz:**## ^^^
##brown|**shiningsilver:**## Good luck ##green|**mansplaining_kanaya**##
##green|**mansplaining_kanaya:**## Thanks Guys

##orange|**aaaaa:**## Poor Kanaya :((( I hope they're okay
##maroon|**reaganomicks:**## yea me too
##lime|**gamemasterkindaforalittlebitofweed:**## sorry to bring the conversation back to stupid shit but
##red|**halpidkplz:**## Go ahead
##lime|**gamemasterkindaforalittlebitofweed:**## okay so what's our next move in the gamers against war
##brown|**shiningsilver:**## Well, I'm working on setting up some more bot accounts on Tumblr. Anybody have any status updates?

##lime|**gamemasterkindaforalittlebitofweed:**## we will not surrender
##orange|**aaaaa:**## I am staying out of it! But it is funny to watch XD
##maroon|**reaganomicks:**## ##brown|**shiningsilver**## spamming subreddits as we speka
##maroon|**reaganomicks:**## speak8
##maroon|**reaganomicks:**## speak*
##red|**halpidkplz:**## Nice lmao
##red|**halpidkplz:**## I've spread some memetics around a couple Discords, I think they're gaining traction there
##purple|**elouanwastaken:**## holy shit this is like an actual thing you're doing
##brown|**shiningsilver:**## Yep.
##purple|**elouanwastaken:**## i love this
##blue|**hellcat:**## Did you know that world-renowned writer Stephen King was once hit by a car? Just something to consider.
##lightseagreen|**professorwhitesphere:**## OH NO THEY GOT HELLCAT
##black|**juice:**## .mute ##blue|**hellcat**##
##grey|**Server:**## 1 user has been muted
##brown|**shiningsilver:**## Le sign.
##brown|**shiningsilver:**## Welp, I gotta leave for school soon. Good luck comrades.
##red|**halpidkplz:**## See you later
##purple|**eloaunwastaken:**## lmao ttyl
##orange|**aaaaa:**## Byeeeee!! :D
##darkblue|**risingstorm:**## have a good day
##maroon|**reaganomicks:**## byebye
##grey|**Server:**## 1 user has left
##red|**halpidkplz:**## Okay but does anyone else wonder if maybe we shouldn't be doing this?
##lime|**gamemasterkindaforalittlebitofweed:**## doing what?
##red|**halpidkplz:**## All this memetic stuff, the Gamers Against War thing
##red|**halpidkplz:**## I mean I'm all for telling people not to do drugs, addiction is a scary thing but we're messing with people's minds
##red|**halpidkplz:**## There's no way this is healthy

##red|**halpidkplz:**## Just because they're doing it doesn't mean WE should too. They're professionals and we're just kids sitting in our rooms
##lightseagreen|**professorwhitesphere:**## i mean these kinds of memetics arent really dangerous
##lightseagreen|**professorwhitesphere:**## we're just putting an idea in people's heads

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
__
__
[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Department of Public Disinformation
**From:** Director Richard Praf
**Subject:** Recent Veil Threats
[[/div]]
------
This situation is getting out of hand. We should not be facing serious threats to the Veil because a bunch of gamers are waging an internet war. Until this situation is resolved, anyone assigned to the "Gamers Against War" incident are working overtime to clean this up, and you will all be reprimanded for letting it get to this point. I'm disappointed that I even need to send this email.

Regards,
Director Richard Praf
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Director Richard Praf
**From:** Agent Ryan Masyl
**Subject:** Re:Recent Veil Threats
[[/div]]
------
With all due respect, director, it isn't our fault that a bunch of kids with no other priorities are spreading memetic agents on every level of the internet. We shouldn't be punished for lacking the resources to deal with such a surprisingly massive threat. If we're going to get in trouble for not being supplied with the resources to deal with the GAW crisis, I'll be speaking to human resources.

Sincerely,
Agent Ryan Masyl
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Director Richard Praf
**From:** Agent Leo Wraig
**Subject:** Re:Recent Veil Threats
[[/div]]
------
Sir, if you want us to effectively filter all of the memetic agents being circulated by GAW and GFW, we need resources. You're barely devoting enough people or webcrawlers to this situation and still expecting us to keep everything under the radar. If you care about protecting the Veil, stop devoting resources to less pressing projects and focus on the urgent matter at hand.

Thank you,
Agent Leo Wraig
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Director Richard Praf
**From:** Agent Samantha Alistor
**Subject:** Re:Recent Veil Threats
[[/div]]
------
Director Praf,
Marijuana usage has been fluctuating at unprecedented levels the past several days, and people are starting to notice. Approximately 17% of all images uploaded to social media platforms in the previous 48 hours have been anomalous in nature, and that number is only growing. This is more than our department can handle at the moment. Yes, GAW and GFW are just young adults, but they're powerful young adults. [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/phantom-blunt At least one of them has over a dozen confirmed casualties.] We need at least 3 times the manpower and a lot more funding than you're currently granting us. Things are getting dire.

Agent Samantha Alistor
[[/div]]
----

[[div class="blockquote"]]
+ Bluntfiend's Humble War Room
----
##green|**bluntfiend:**## Okay so
##blue|**polaricecraps:**## ?
##green|**bluntfiend:**## shiningsilver, Gamers For Weed's leader, contacted me about a truce. He wants to speak with us. Should I add her to the chat?
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## i say go for it
##maroon|**harmpit:**## srue
##orange|**jockjamsvol6:**## It couldn't hurt.
##red|**gaycopmp4:**## what they said
##green|**bluntfiend:**## Alright, give me a moment.
##grey|**Server:**## 1 user has joined
##green|**bluntfiend:**## Welcome, ##brown|**shiningsilver**##
##brown|**shiningsilver:**## Hello all. I have come to propose an end to the Gamers Against War.
##deeppink|**kkrule:**## :O
##green|**bluntfiend:**## May I ask why?
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## ^^^ im curious too
##brown|**shiningsilver:**## It's been a few weeks, and the joke is kind of wearing off. The members of GFW are getting tired of having to avoid memetics on social media, and the Janitors are getting pissed. Plus hellcat won't stop talking about Stephen King and nobody knows how to fix them.
##red|**gaycopmp4:**## ok maybe it is a little funny
##blue|**polaricecraps:**## rofl
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## lmao i can take care of that
##green|**bluntfiend:**## Back to the topic at hand, what exactly do you propose?
##brown|**shiningsilver:**## I propose we call an immediate ceasefire in the Gamers Against War.
##orange|**jockjamsvol6:**## So we win?
##red|**gaycopmp4:**## of course we win they're surrendering
##brown|**shiningsilver:**## No. I am suggesting a draw.
##maroon|**harmpit:**## ok wec an clal ita dawr
##maroon|**harmpit:**## but erveyon nkows we raely wown
##red|**gaycopm4:**## ^
##purple|**lesbian_gengar:**## lmao
##green|**bluntfiend:**## Okay, deal. It's settled. The Gamers Against War has officially come to an end.
##orange|**jockjamsvol6:**## Many smokers were lost, but just as many were gained. Truly a devastating conflict.
##brown|**shiningsilver:**## It was a pleasure, gentlemen/women/people.
##grey|**Server:**## 1 user has left
##deeppink|**kkrule:**## now that that's over, im starting a stream, does anyone want to watch?
##black|**bones:**## I will watch ##deeppink|**kkrule**##. Send me the hyperlink in a private message.
##deeppink|**kkrule:**## thank you! :D
##red|**gaycopmp4:**## well it was fun while it lasted lmao
##green|**bluntfiend:**## I need a smoke.

**To:** Agent Leo Wraig

**Subject:** End of the War
[[/div]]
------
Are you getting written up, Leo? A few people said Praf was actually following through with this whole thing. I hope not.

Sincerely,
Agent Ryan Masyl
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Agent Ryan Masyl
**From:** Agent Leo Wraig
**Subject:** Re:End of the War
[[/div]]
------
He told some of us if we could get everything cleaned up by Saturday we'd be in the clear. Not sure how the hell we're supposed to clean up the entire internet of memetics in a day, but we'll figure it out.

Warm wishes,
Agent Leo Wraig
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Agent Leo Wraig
**From:** Agent Ryan Masyl
**Subject:** Re:Re:End of the War
[[/div]]
------
Oh great. We have to clean up thousands of fucking memetics, and we're probably going to get demoted for it all.

Fuck this war.

Sincerely,
Agent Ryan Masyl
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Agent Ryan Masyl
**From:** Agent Leo Wraig
**Subject:** Re:Re:Re:End of the War

This whole thing was so fucking dumb.

I'm going to talk to HR soon and sort this all out. If we get anything good, I'll make sure you're good, Ryan.

Warm wishes,
Agent Leo Wraig
